channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls
item.description: Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm of the season.

item.title: National Guard member shot in DC has shown positive signs, West Virginia governor says
White House says admiral ordered follow-on strike on alleged drug boat, insists attack was lawful
